LanguageData.ParticipatedInRaid_Required.stages.parti: I participated in a raid! Now they'll all know me!
LanguageData.ParticipatedInRaid_Respected.stages.part: I participated in a raid! That's how we do it!
LanguageData.RecentConquest_Required.stages.recent_co: We recently raided another faction. Their suffering will be their teacher.
LanguageData.RecentConquest_Required.stages.no_recent: We haven't raided anyone for so long. We're despicable - helpless worms like the rest.
LanguageData.RecentConquest_Respected.stages.recent_c: We recently raided another faction. That'll show them who's boss.
LanguageData.RecentConquest_Respected.stages.no_recen: It's been far too long since we raided anyone. They might stop fearing and respecting us.
